## Source: ossf-package-analysis (12143d1c19f403559d49925266742f6b2ca75a3fda8ed195a4e0189bf64dce70)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nativescript-gainsight-px2' @ 1.11.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
